children.value: All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. This project adheres to
This project now uses PHPStan instead of Psalm for static analysis
This component is no longer supported on PHP 8.1
as well as the functionality it controlled has been removed
This component is no longer supported on PHP 7.3, PHP 7.4 and PHP 8.0
: Micro performance improvements on parsing paths
This component is now supported on PHP 8
Tests etc. are now ignored for archive exports
This component is no longer supported on PHP 7.1 and PHP 7.2
: Micro performance improvements on parsing paths
does not trigger a deprecation warning
: Excluding an array that contains false ends up excluding the current working directory
: Exclude is not considered if it is a parent of the base path
This component is no longer supported on PHP 5.3, PHP 5.4, PHP 5.5, PHP 5.6, and PHP 7.0
: Exclude is not considered if it is a parent of the base path
: Factory should use canonical directory names
: Added support for wildcards (glob) in exclude
